response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled quality, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. For this exceptional piece, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $7,500. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. Looking forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 7500}
